content: I've been wearing my black Adidas sneakers almost every day since I got them, and I have to say, they're really comfortable. They're also super versatile - I've worn them for casual outings, workouts at the gym, and even just lounging around. I think the Superstar might be a bit more stylish, but I'm not sure if it's as comfortable as my current sneakers. Can you tell me more about the break-in period for the Superstar? Is it easy to get used to the shell toe cap?
